summary:
## Grand Prix Motorcycle Racing: A Quick Look

Grand Prix motorcycle racing is the coolest, fastest motorcycle racing in the world! It's been around since the 1900s, and is now run by the FIM. Riders race special bikes built just for speed, not for regular roads.

There are four classes: MotoGP (the fastest), Moto2, Moto3, and MotoE (which uses electric bikes).

Giacomo Agostini is the all-time champion with 15 titles, but Valentino Rossi is right behind him with 89 race wins in the top class.
title: Grand Prix motorcycle racing
